short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Price calculator. Convert any asset price to bitcoin or to other crypto, fiat or commodity asset.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Bitcoin Mindset extension you can easily convert any asset price to bitcoin or to other crypto, fiat or commodity asset. Just by typing number to any input in the extension popup or by selecting the value in the web page and opening the extension popup to see the conversions.

Extension will automatically convert provided asset value to all other configured assets so as you can easily see how asset prices are related to each other, which is very helpful when working with cryptocurrencies.

Configuration is really handy. You can easily setup just the assets, which are important to you directly from the popup layout. You can also manage your portfolio.

Extension requires no page write or even read permission, all user configuration is stored directly in the browser local storage and no data is going outside of it.

Visit: https://bitcoinmindset.org
